name: clankerkit
description: ClankerKit — Autonomous wallet operations for AI agents on Monad — swap, stake, deploy, trade memecoins, and manage spending policies
author: ClankerKit Team

tools.name: get_wallet_info
tools.description: Get current wallet information including balance and policy state

tools.name: get_token_balance
tools.description: Get the ERC20 token balance of the agent wallet

token.description: Token symbol (WMON, USDC, DAK, CHOG, YAKI) or contract address

tools.name: send_tokens
tools.description: Send native MON tokens to an address

tools.name: send_token
tools.description: Send ERC20 tokens to an address

tools.name: execute_transaction
tools.description: Execute an arbitrary transaction on a smart contract

tools.name: swap_tokens
tools.description: Swap tokens on Monad via Kuru DEX aggregator. Supports any token by symbol (MON, USDC, WMON, CHOG, DAK, AUSD, WETH, WBTC) or by contract address (0x...). When the user provides a contract address (CA), pass it directly as tokenIn or tokenOut. The amount should be a human-readable number (e.g. '0.01' for 0.01 MON) — it will be converted to wei automatically based on the input token's decimals.

tokenIn.description: Source token: symbol (MON, USDC, WMON, etc.) or contract address (0x...)

tokenOut.description: Target token: symbol (MON, USDC, WMON, etc.) or contract address (0x...)

amount.description: Amount to swap in human-readable form (e.g. '0.01' for 0.01 tokens). Converted to wei automatically.

tools.name: get_swap_quote
tools.description: Get a swap quote without executing. Supports any token by symbol or contract address (0x...).

tokenIn.description: Source token: symbol or contract address (0x...)

tokenOut.description: Target token: symbol or contract address (0x...)

amount.description: Amount in human-readable form (e.g. '0.01'). Converted to wei automatically.

tools.name: stake_mon
tools.description: Stake MON tokens with a validator to earn rewards

amount.description: Amount of MON to stake in wei

validatorId.description: Validator ID (optional, uses default if not specified)

tools.name: unstake_mon
tools.description: Unstake MON tokens from a validator (starts withdrawal process)

tools.name: withdraw_stake
tools.description: Withdraw unstaked MON after withdrawal delay (1 epoch) has passed

tools.name: claim_staking_rewards
tools.description: Claim accumulated staking rewards

tools.name: compound_rewards
tools.description: Compound (re-stake) accumulated staking rewards

tools.name: get_staking_info
tools.description: Get staking delegation info for the agent's wallet

tools.name: get_policy
tools.description: Get current spending policy limits and usage

tools.name: update_daily_limit
tools.description: Update the daily spending limit

tools.name: pay_for_service
tools.description: Pay for an x402-enabled API endpoint

tools.name: register_agent
tools.description: Register this agent on ERC-8004 identity registry

tools.name: get_kuru_markets
tools.description: List known Kuru CLOB orderbook markets on Monad mainnet

tools.name: get_order_book
tools.description: Fetch the live L2 order book (bids and asks) for a Kuru CLOB market

tools.name: get_market_price
tools.description: Get best bid, ask, and mid price for a Kuru CLOB market

tools.name: kuru_market_order
tools.description: Place a market (IOC) order on a Kuru CLOB market. Agent EOA must hold the tokens.

amount.description: Amount in human-readable float (quote for buy, base for sell)

isBuy.description: True for a buy order, false for a sell order

tools.name: kuru_limit_order
tools.description: Place a limit (GTC) order on a Kuru CLOB market

price.description: Order price in quote asset (human-readable float)

size.description: Order size in base asset (human-readable float)

isBuy.description: True for a bid, false for an ask

postOnly.description: Reject if the order would immediately cross the spread

tools.name: cancel_kuru_orders
tools.description: Cancel one or more open orders on a Kuru CLOB market

orderIds.description: Array of order ID strings to cancel

tools.name: kyber_swap
tools.description: Execute a cross-chain swap on Ethereum/Polygon/Arbitrum/Optimism/Base/BSC/Avalanche via KyberSwap aggregator. No API key needed.

chain.description: Target chain: ethereum, polygon, arbitrum, optimism, base, bsc, avalanche

tokenIn.description: Source token address on the target chain

tokenOut.description: Destination token address on the target chain

amountIn.description: Amount to sell in the token's smallest unit (wei)

tools.name: zerox_swap
tools.description: Execute a cross-chain swap via 0x Swap API v2. Requires ZEROX_API_KEY env var.

chain.description: Target chain: ethereum, polygon, arbitrum, optimism, base, bsc, avalanche

amountIn.description: Amount to sell in smallest unit

tools.name: get_meme_tokens
tools.description: Get live price metrics for all known Monad memecoins (DAK, CHOG, YAKI) from Kuru CLOB orderbooks

tools.name: get_token_price
tools.description: Get live price metrics for a specific Monad token by symbol or address

token.description: Token symbol (DAK, CHOG, YAKI) or contract address

tools.name: smart_trade
tools.description: Evaluate or execute an autonomous trading strategy for a Monad memecoin. Strategies: dca, momentum, scalp, hodl.

strategyType.description: Strategy type: dca, momentum, scalp, hodl

stopLoss.description: Stop-loss as a fraction (0.1 = -10% from entry)

takeProfit.description: Take-profit as a fraction (0.3 = +30% from entry)

dcaIntervals.description: For DCA strategy: number of equal-sized purchases

momentumThreshold.description: For momentum strategy: minimum 24h price change fraction (0.05 = +5%)

autoExecute.description: If true, actually place the order. If false (default), dry-run only.

tools.name: create_policy
tools.description: Create a spending policy for the agent wallet. Sets daily and weekly MON limits, optional token/contract allowlists, and optional approval threshold. Must be called once before the wallet can execute guarded transactions.

dailyLimit.description: Maximum MON spend per day (human-readable, e.g. '1.0')

weeklyLimit.description: Maximum MON spend per week (human-readable). Defaults to 7x dailyLimit if omitted.

allowedTokens.description: Optional list of ERC20 token addresses the agent is allowed to transfer. Empty = all tokens allowed.

allowedContracts.description: Optional list of contract addresses the agent is allowed to call. Empty = all contracts allowed.

requireApprovalAbove.description: MON threshold above which owner approval is required (human-readable). 0 = no threshold.

tools.name: ensure_gas
tools.description: Ensure the agent EOA has enough MON for gas fees. If the EOA balance is below the minimum threshold, automatically sends MON from the AgentWallet contract to the EOA. Call this before executing transactions if unsure whether the agent has gas. Users only need to fund the wallet contract address — the agent tops up its own gas from there.

minBalance.description: Minimum acceptable EOA balance in MON (human-readable, default '0.01')

topUpAmount.description: Amount of MON to send to EOA if below minimum (human-readable, default '0.05')

tools.name: deploy_policy_engine
tools.description: Deploy a new PolicyEngine contract on Monad. The deployer (AGENT_PRIVATE_KEY) becomes the owner. Returns the deployed contract address.

tools.name: deploy_agent_wallet
tools.description: Deploy a new AgentWallet contract on Monad. Optionally deploys a PolicyEngine too if none is provided. Returns the wallet and policy engine addresses.

owner.description: Address that will own the wallet (can transfer ownership, withdraw all funds)

agent.description: Address of the AI agent EOA allowed to call execute() on the wallet

policyEngine.description: Optional: address of an existing PolicyEngine contract. If omitted, a new one is deployed first.

AGENT_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Private key for the agent (without 0x prefix)

ZEROX_API_KEY.description: 0x Swap API v2 key (required only for zerox_swap tool). Get free key at dashboard.0x.org
